title: (x) Glamour Magazine nameplate - (based on) Franklin Gothic {Gina (self)}
content:
little help? need to know the name of the font used for Glamour magazine’s title.

thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Glamour\_logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20091212105053/http:/typophile.com/files/Glamour_logo.gif) | 2.81 KB |
author: boogieg

comments.content: i’m looking at it more and more and thought maybe it was Franklin Gothic Heavy, but it’s just a \*tad\* off. I stretched the height and it’s soooo close, but not exactly right.
Most magazine logos, even if they start out as type, are usually tweaked and finessed. I think you’re right about Glamour’s ancestor, though.
